channel.title: EDIT: Combat level problem
channel.description:
How would I make it say their combat level too in this code?
[code] PlayerHandler.messageToAll = ppl.playerName+" has just slain the KBD!";[/code]
I want it so say at the end something like:
Chassy has just slain the KBD! They are level (combat level here)
or something clsoe to that
